org.waarp.common.database

Class ConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.database.ConnectionFactory

  • public class ConnectionFactory
extends Object
    A singleton wrapper of Datasource to get database connection object

      • propertiesFor

        protected static DbProperties propertiesFor(String server)
                                     throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Parameters:
        server - the connection url of the database
        Returns:
        the DbProperties Object associated with the requested URL
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the requested database is not supported

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(String server,
              String user,
              String password)
                       throws SQLException,
                              UnsupportedOperationException
        Initialize the ConnectionFactory
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the requested database is not supported
        SQLException - if a error occurs while connecting to the database

      • getInstance

        public static ConnectionFactory getInstance()
        Returns:
        the initialized ConnectionFactory or null if the ConnectionFactory is not initialized

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
                         throws SQLException
        Returns:
        a connection to the Database
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the ConnectionPool is not initialized or if an error occurs while accessing the database
